alert.note: Alert for Morgan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Morgan County through 545 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Log Lane Village, or 5 miles northwest of Fort Morgan, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Morgan, Log Lane Village, Antelope Springs and Weldona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
